mapper.sql: ID, MAT_PRO_ID, NAME, LEVEL_CERT, LICENCE_AUTHORITH, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, MOT, ATTACH
mapper.insert:
insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_PRO
ID,
MAT_PRO_ID,
NAME,
LEVEL_CERT,
LICENCE_AUTHORITH,
EXP_START_DATE,
EXP_END_DATE,
MOT,
ATTACH,
#{id},
#{matProId},
#{name},
#{levelCert},
#{licenceAuthorith},
#{expStartDate},
#{expEndDate},
#{mot},
#{attach},
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_PRO
MAT_PRO_ID = #{matProId},
NAME = #{name},
LEVEL_CERT = #{levelCert},
LICENCE_AUTHORITH = #{licenceAuthorith},
EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate},
EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate},
MOT = #{mot},
ATTACH = #{attach},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_PRO set MAT_PRO_ID = #{matProId}, NAME = #{name}, LEVEL_CERT = #{levelCert}, LICENCE_AUTHORITH = #{licenceAuthorith}, EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate}, EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate}, MOT = #{mot}, ATTACH = #{attach} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.ID as ID_, t2.NAME as FILE_NAME from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_PRO t1 left join T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_ATTACHMENT t2 on t1.ID = t2.BUSINESS_ID where t1.MAT_PRO_ID = #{supplierMatProId} and (t2.IS_DELETED = 0 or t2.IS_DELETED is null)
select * from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_PRO c,T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_PRO m where m.Id = c.MAT_PRO_ID AND m.SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId}
